snippet: GOREVIC--Charles, age 98, passed away January 20, 2016 after a long and good life as an art dealer, husband, father, grandfather and great-grandfather. Predeceased by his wife Ursula, he is missed by his loving family, sons Roger and Peter and their wives Cali and Judy, grandchildren Jason (Diana), Genna, Martine (Mac) and Neal (Brittany), and great-grandchildren Jonah, Hannah, Ashton and Thomas 1/3
lead_paragraph: GOREVIC--Charles, age 98, passed away January 20, 2016 after a long and good life as an art dealer, husband, father, grandfather and great-grandfather. Predeceased by his wife Ursula, he is missed by his loving family, sons Roger and Peter and their wives Cali and Judy, grandchildren Jason (Diana), Genna, Martine (Mac) and Neal (Brittany), and great-grandchildren Jonah, Hannah, Ashton and Thomas 1/3
